name: CreateInterviewSchedule
description:
Create a new scheduled interview in Ashby.

This tool creates a scheduled interview in the Ashby platform, requiring the 'interviewsWrite' permission.

parameters.name: interview_schedule_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing applicationId, interviewEvents, and optional extraData for scheduling an interview.

startTime.description: The start time of this event

endTime.description: The end time of this event

email.description: The email address of the user in Ashby

feedbackRequired.description: Whether this interviewer is required to provide feedback

extraData.description:
This field stores information, structured as key-value pairs, for your own use and reference, for example a unique identifier for your own system.
Do not store personally identifiable information (PII) in this field. In addition, the following constraints apply:
- Keys must be strings of at most 100 characters.
- Values must be strings of at most 512 characters.
- The total size of the extra data must be less than 1kb.

We recommend using a prefix for your keys to avoid collisions with other systems, as data stored in this field is available to all API users with permission to access the underlying object.

interviewEvents.description: The list of events that make up this interview schedule
